Query data from github and store locally for conky.

== Overview

The script queries information from github and stores them in local files for
conky to pick up.

=== Script Arguments

* _$@_ (...): The same parameters as the Github CLI app.

=== Script Example

[source, bash]

----
./run.sh --version
----
